# center

**Instance Property**

The x and y position to use as the center of the effect.

## Declaration

```swift
var center: CGPoint { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **scale**: The size of the hexagons.

items.description: The image to use as an input image.
